Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.1: And thou son of man, prophesy to the mountains of Israel, and say: Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.2: Thus saith the Lord God: Because the enemy hath said of you: Aha, the everlasting heights are given to us for an inheritance.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.3: Therefore prophesy, and say: Thus saith the Lord God: Because you have been desolate, and trodden under foot on every side, and made an inheritance to the rest of the nations, and are become the subject of the talk, and the reproach of the people:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.4: Therefore, ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord God: Thus saith the Lord God to the mountains, and to the hills, to the brooks, and to the valleys, and to desolate places, and ruinous walls, and to the cities that are forsaken, that are spoiled, and derided by the rest of the nations round about.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.5: Therefore thus saith the Lord God: In the fire of my zeal I have spoken of the rest of the nations, and of all Edom, who have taken my land to themselves, for an inheritance with joy, and with all the heart, and with the mind: and have cast it out to lay it waste.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.6: Prophesy therefore concerning the land of Israel, and say to the mountains, and to the hills, to the ridges, and to the valleys: Thus saith the Lord God: Behold I have spoken in my zeal, and in my indignation, because you have borne the shame of the Gentiles.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.7: Therefore thus saith the Lord God: I have lifted up my hand, that the Gentiles who are round about you, shall themselves bear their shame.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.8: But as for you, O mountains of Israel, shoot ye forth your branches, and yield your fruit to my people of Israel: for they are at hand to come.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.9: For lo I am for you, and I will turn to you, and you shall be ploughed and sown.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.10: And I will multiply men upon you, and all the house of Israel: and the cities shall be inhabited, and the ruinous places shall be repaired.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.11: And I will make you abound with men and with beasts: and they shall be multiplied, and increased: and I will settle you as from the beginning, and will give you greater gifts, than you had from the beginning: and you shall know that I am the Lord.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.12: And I will bring men upon you, my people Israel, and they shall possess thee for their inheritance: and thou shalt be their inheritance, and shalt no more henceforth be without them.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.13: Thus saith the Lord God: Because they say of you: Thou art a devourer of men, and one that suffocatest thy nation:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.14: Therefore thou shalt devour men no more, nor destroy thy nation any more, saith the Lord God:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.15: Neither will I cause men to hear in thee the shame of the nations any more, nor shalt thou bear the reproach of the people, <u>nor lose thy nation any more</u>, saith the Lord God.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.16: And the word of the Lord came to me, saying:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.17: Son of man, when the house of Israel dwelt in their own land, they defiled it with their ways, and with their doings: their way was before me like the uncleanness of a menstruous woman.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.18: And I poured out my indignation upon them for the blood which they had shed upon the land, and with their idols they defiled it.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.19: And I scattered them among the nations, and they are dispersed through the countries: I have judged them according to their ways, and their devices.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.20: And when they entered among the nations whither they went, they profaned my holy name, when it was said of them: This is the people of the Lord, and they are come forth out of his land.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.21: And I have regarded my own holy name, which the house of Israel hath profaned among the nations to which they went in.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.22: Therefore thou shalt say to the house of Israel: Thus saith the Lord God: It is not for your sake that I will do this, O house of Israel, but for my holy name's sake, which you have profaned among the nations whither you went.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.23: And I will sanctify my great name, which was profaned among the Gentiles, which you have profaned in the midst of them: that the Gentiles may know that I am the Lord, saith the Lord of hosts, when I shall be sanctified in you before their eyes.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.24: For I will take you from among the Gentiles, and will gather you together out of all the countries, and will bring you into your own land.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.25: And I will pour upon you clean water, and you shall be cleansed from all your filthiness, and I will cleanse you from all your idols.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.26: And I will give you a new heart, and put a new spirit within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and will give you a heart of flesh.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.27: And I will put my spirit in the midst of you: and I will cause you to walk in my commandments, and to keep my judgments, and do them.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.28: And you shall dwell in the land which I gave to your fathers, and you shall be my people, and I will be your God.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.29: And I will save you from all your uncleannesses: and I will call for corn, and will multiply it, and will lay no famine upon you.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.30: And I will multiply the fruit of the tree, and the increase of the field, that you bear no more the reproach of famine among the nations.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.31: And you shall remember your wicked ways, and your doings that were not good: and your iniquities, and your wicked deeds shall displease you.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.32: It is not for your sakes that I will do this, saith the Lord God, be it known to you: be confounded, and ashamed at your own ways, O house of Israel.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.33: Thus saith the Lord God: In the day that I shall cleanse you from all your iniquities, and shall cause the cities to be inhabited, and shall repair the ruinous places,
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.34: And the desolate land shall be tilled, which before was waste in the sight of all that passed by,
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.35: They shall say: This land that was untilled is become as a garden of pleasure: and the cities that were abandoned, and desolate, and destroyed, are peopled and fenced.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.36: And the nations, that shall be left round about you, shall know that I the Lord have built up what was destroyed, and planted what was desolate, that I the Lord have spoken and done it.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.37: Thus saith the Lord God: Moreover in this shall the house of Israel find me, that I will do it for them: I will multiply them as a flock of men,
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__36.38: As a holy flock, as the flock of Jerusalem in her solemn feasts: so shall the waste cities be full of flocks of men: and they shall know that I am the Lord.
